description.p:
WeSay helps non-linguists build a dictionary in their own language. It has various ways to help native speakers to think of words in their language and enter some basic data about them (no backslash codes, just forms to fill in).
The program is customizable and task-oriented, giving the advisor the ability to turn on/off tasks as needed and as the user receives training for those tasks.
WeSay uses a standard XML format and can be automatically exchanged with our linguist-oriented tool like Fieldworks Language Explorer (FLEx).
Users can collaborate via USB flash drive, email, and network connections.
